author: W. E. Messamore
title: Easter Is Resurrecting Stupidity as Some Churches Plan to Defy Lockdown
description: Despite orders to contain coronavirus, and because of exemptions in several states, some churches are holding large gatherings for Easter. Unfortunately, the coronavirus doesn't take holidays off. The post Easter Is Resurrecting Stupidity as Some Churches Pla…
content:
• Some churches are openly defying coronavirus orders on Easter.
  • They argue its their constitutional right to gather.
  • Others will worship in states that have given churches an exemption.
